node.title: Pipecat Framework
node.description: Main framework node representing the entire Pipecat real-time voice and multimodal AI agent system

node.title: Audio Processing
node.description: Audio processing subsystem including DTMF, filters, mixers, resamplers, VAD, and turn detection

props.prop: DTMF, Filters, Mixers, Resamplers, VAD, Smart Turn

node.title: AI Services
node.description: AI service integrations including LLMs, STT, TTS, Speech-to-Speech, Vision, and Memory services

props.prop: AssemblyAI, AWS, Azure, Cartesia, Deepgram, ElevenLabs, Gladia, Google, Groq, OpenAI, Speechmatics, Whisper
Anthropic, AWS, Azure, Cerebras, DeepSeek, Fireworks, Gemini, Grok, Groq, Mistral, OpenAI, Together
AsyncAI, AWS, Azure, Cartesia, Deepgram, ElevenLabs, Google, Groq, LMNT, OpenAI, PlayHT, Rime
AWS Nova Sonic, Gemini Multimodal Live, OpenAI Realtime

node.title: Transport Layer
node.description: Transport layer for real-time communication including WebRTC, WebSocket, and telephony integrations

node.title: Pipeline System
node.description: Core pipeline system for orchestrating tasks, processors, and data flow in real-time

props.prop: Base Pipeline, Parallel Pipeline, Sync Parallel Pipeline

node.title: Processors
node.description: Data processing components including audio processors, filters, aggregators, and framework integrations

node.title: Frames System
node.description: Data frame system for handling audio, video, text, and control frames with protobuf serialization

node.title: Utilities
node.description: Utility functions and helpers including async operations, text processing, tracing, and metrics

node.title: Extensions
node.description: Framework extensions including IVR and voicemail capabilities

node.title: STT Services
node.description: Speech-to-Text (STT) services that convert spoken audio into text transcriptions. These services support various audio formats, languages, and real-time streaming capabilities.

node.title: TTS Services
node.description: Text-to-Speech (TTS) services that convert text into natural-sounding speech audio. These services offer various voices, languages, and audio streaming capabilities.

node.title: LLM Services
node.description: Large Language Model (LLM) services that provide AI chat completions, text generation, and conversational capabilities with function calling support.

node.title: STS Services
node.description: Speech-to-Speech (STS) services that provide end-to-end multimodal real-time conversational AI with bidirectional audio streaming, combining speech recognition, language understanding, and speech synthesis in a single service.

item.field: OpenAI Realtime API for bidirectional speech
Azure OpenAI Realtime with Azure auth

node.title: Image Services
node.description: Image generation services that create images from text prompts using AI models like DALL-E, Imagen, and Stable Diffusion.

node.title: Video Services
node.description: Video generation and avatar services that create AI-powered video content with digital avatars and realistic human-like video synthesis.

node.title: Other Services
node.description: Specialized services including memory management, vision analysis, and Model Context Protocol (MCP) integration for extending LLM capabilities with external tools.

item.field: Model Context Protocol for tool integration
